item.title: A code for max cash i get the message integer to larg this is a 639 dementhium
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“wildskiller, post:5, topic:436169”]2417000000 - 2,147,483,648 = 269,516,352 over the maximum int capacity
You wonder why runescape never used a long…[/quote]
There is no right or wrong for using any data type, because they all have an individual use based on opinion. It wouldn’t hurt to use the long int, but it only seems logical if the cash flow was increased by like 50x.

Read full topic

item.title: A code for max cash i get the message integer to larg this is a 639 dementhium
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

The data type “int” only supports numbers from -2,147,483,648 to 2,147,483,647.
